events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but I want to request a refund because the size doesn't fit me at all.
System identified the customer's request as related to refund based on keywords in the initial message.
The case was routed to refund specialist agent John D. for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund for your recent purchase. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so we can process your request quickly?
Sure, the order number is 78900456. The jacket is too small and the style isn’t what I expected after seeing it in person.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate the refund process once you send the jacket back to us. We’ll cover the return shipping cost.
That sounds good to me. I appreciate that you’re covering the return shipping. I will send the jacket back this week.
We have received the returned jacket and your refund has been processed. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case now since the refund has been successfully processed and no further issues were reported.
